titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the well ordering of His Maiesties courtand [sic] traine, as well in his present journey intended towards his kingdome of Scotland, and returne from thence, as in all other His Maiesties journeys and progresses hereafter.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at Whitehall, the fifth day of May, in the ninth yeere of the Reigne of our Souereigne Lord Charles by the grace of God King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
